price: Taj dan prijatelji će jedni drugima neprijatelji biti, osim bogobojaznih.
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
